name: MineField (itch) (divinsphere)
description:
Based on a classic, MineField is a puzzle-style game, the goal is to find all the mines to prevent them from exploding, otherwise, BOOM!

Look at the numbers indicated in the squares to find out how many mines are around it

Use the shield to escape from situations where even with the indicated numbers, you can not know where the location of the mine, you can use up to 3 shells per game, it must be activated before use

Customizations available

Choose one of the themes available to have a more visually engaging experience, choose how many bombs you want to look for, increases the width of the search area and change the color of the numbers
